Value:

do { (ipaddr)->addr[0] = htonl((u32_t)((a & 0xffff) << 16) | (b & 0xffff)); \
                                               (ipaddr)->addr[1] = htonl(((c & 0xffff) << 16) | (d & 0xffff)); \
                                               (ipaddr)->addr[2] = htonl(((e & 0xffff) << 16) | (f & 0xffff)); \
                                               (ipaddr)->addr[3] = htonl(((g & 0xffff) << 16) | (h & 0xffff)); } while(0)
